text: (nabiye,) ni avarute kuttattiluntayirikkukayum, avarkk netrtvam nalkikkeant namaskaram nirvahikkukayumanenkil avaril oru vibhagam ninre kute nilkkatte. avar avarute ayudhannal etukkukayum ceyyatte. annane avar sujud ceyt kalinnal avar ninnalute pinnilekk marinilkkukayum, namaskariccittillatta marre vibhagam vann ninre kute namaskarikkukayum ceyyatte. avar jagrata kaikkeallukayum, tannalute ayudhannal etukkukayum ceyyentatan‌. ninnalute ayudhannalepparriyum, ninnalute sadhanannalepparriyum ninnal asrad'dharayenkil, ninnalute nere tirinn orearra annati natattamayirunnuvenn satyanisedhikal meahikkukayan‌. ennal mala karanam ninnalkk salyamuntakukayea, ninnal reagabadhitarakukayea ceytal ninnalute ayudhannal tale vekkunnatin kurramilla. ennal ninnal jagrata pularttuka tanne venam. tirccayayum allahu satyanisedhikalkk apamanakaramaya siksa orukkiveccittunt‌
